attributes.action: build a railway station in portishead bristol
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: to keep it simple house building is sky high ,population is sky high,motorway capacity is sky high,polution is sky high,a railway line already exists,the demand already exists,the solution = replace 4 miles of track and build station,simple everyone can then commute and be happy.this wouldn`t even hardly cost anything! the land is even vacant awaiting station.please look into this as it`s long awaited and as by the end of the year this town wont cope it`s too small thanx m.sperring

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "build a railway station in portishead bristol."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14145.asp

Prime Minister's Office
